I am seeing a similar issue when I am debugging my runtime-workspace using the latest nightly build.

However, I can't seem to reproduce the problem with 3.2 RC1 build. 

I think this problem is more critical than just P3 because the JDT debugger became totally un-usable once I hit this error, and need to be addressed in 3.2.

Here is the content of the error event from the Error Log view:
